column5: I own a guiding service called Rainy River Adventures, which is located on Rainy Lake, Rainy River and Lake of the Woods. I have 1 to 7 day adventures to choose from. The rainy is now open and we are catching some nice walleye's. Sturgeon are expected to in good numbers this year. And as usual LOTW's will be great and Rainy Lake. If interested please email or call me @ (807) 274-4584.
Interested in a trip to the rainy river in the next two weeks. Whats the limit? your prices? lodgeing situation?
